comment.author: 13935339@N05
comment._content: The former Project EXTRAVERSION YP-80As, serial 44-83028 & 44-83029 (flying "Tail End Charlie" and #2, respectively), are led by a third 'YP-80' in similar tail markings - but no photography has turned up to prove that point. It could be Burgess' rendition of P-80A serial 44-85123, which had a long history in flight test and appeared at the '46 Cleveland Air races in such a paint scheme, flown by MAJ Gus Lindquist...
